.cmt this is a comment .sp this is a span .esp .p this is a paragraph .tbl .tr .td this is a table .td you can use tc instead of td to be more idiomatic with tr .tr .tr .td this is a table .td you can use tc instead of td to be more idiomatic with tr .tr .etbl .ep .ol .li this is a ordered list .li it is quicker than writing out all of the > and < .eol .ul .li and for the sake of completion a unordered list .eul .pCopyright 2025 Lucas Nguyen. .ep .p30May2025 .ep.ebody
